"Ah, it's you.": "Are you alone today?"
"So yeah... about Manon..."
"She was... Resurgent ARKS all along, huh."
"Honestly, it came as quite a shock."
"Are you disappointed in Manon?"
"Manon isn't a bad person."
"No. I don't have a reason to be."
"Yeah, I know she's not."
"Manon really cares deeply about all of us."
"I'm well aware of that."
"Regardless of Manon's past, my feelings about her won't change so easily."
"...Besides, I've been hearing a lot of rumors about her lately."
"Rumors?"
"Nothing bad, I hope?"
"Yeah."
"Nah. Just the opposite."

"They say she's been using some amazing
power to help with all sorts of things."

"Apparently there are even some people in Kvaris
Camp who were saved by that power of hers."
"Everyone's really glad she's around."
"In time, I hope more people can gradually come around to accepting her."
"I don't know what kind of power it is, though."
"I'm sure folks will come to understand."
"It won't be easy, but..."
"Yeah. For sure."
"We'll be doing everything we can for her as well."
"If something comes up, don't hesitate to let us know, 'kay?"
